mapper.sql: m_id, m_name, m_subname, m_pic, m_picthumb, m_picslide, m_starring, m_directed, m_tag, m_area, m_lang, m_year, m_type, m_type_expand, m_class, m_topic, m_hide, m_lock, m_state, m_level, m_hits, m_dayhits, m_weekhits, m_monthhits, m_duration, m_score, m_addtime, m_time, m_playfrom, m_downfrom
mapper.select: select count(*) from movie where m_playurl=#{0} and m_class=#{1}
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE m_class=#{mClass} limit 16
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE m_class=#{0} limit #{1} , #{2}
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE m_class=#{mClass} order by rand() limit 8
select c_name from movie_class where c_pid in (SELECT DISTINCT m_class FROM movie) order by c_sort
SELECT * ,FROM_UNIXTIME(m_addtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as addtime FROM movie JOIN movie_class on m_class=c_sort order by m_id desc limit 15
SELECT * ,FROM_UNIXTIME(m_addtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as addtime FROM movie JOIN movie_class on m_class=c_sort order by m_id desc limit #{0} , #{1}
SELECT count(*) FROM movie JOIN movie_class on m_class=c_sort
-- SELECT m_id,m_pic FROM movie where m_pic like '%http://%' SELECT m_pic,m_id FROM movie WHERE MATCH (m_pic) AGAINST ('http' IN BOOLEAN MODE);
mapper.insert: insert into movie (m_id, m_name, m_subname, m_pic, m_picthumb, m_picslide, m_starring, m_directed, m_tag, m_area, m_lang, m_year, m_type, m_type_expand, m_class, m_topic, m_hide, m_lock, m_state, m_level, m_hits, m_dayhits, m_weekhits, m_monthhits, m_duration, m_score, m_addtime, m_time, m_playfrom, m_downfrom, m_content, m_playurl, m_downurl) values (#{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mSubname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mPicthumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mPicslide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mStarring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mDirected,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mYear,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{mType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{mTypeExpand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mHide,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mLock,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mLevel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mHits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mDayhits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mWeekhits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mMonthhits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{mScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mPlayfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mDownfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{mPlayurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{mDownurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update movie
m_name = #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_subname = #{mSubname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_pic = #{mPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_picthumb = #{mPicthumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_picslide = #{mPicslide,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_starring = #{mStarring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_directed = #{mDirected,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_tag = #{mTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_area = #{mArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_lang = #{mLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_year = #{mYear,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
m_type = #{mType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
m_type_expand = #{mTypeExpand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_class = #{mClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_topic = #{mTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_hide = #{mHide,jdbcType=BIT},
m_lock = #{mLock,jdbcType=BIT},
m_state = #{mState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_level = #{mLevel,jdbcType=BIT},
m_hits = #{mHits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_dayhits = #{mDayhits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_weekhits = #{mWeekhits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_monthhits = #{mMonthhits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_duration = #{mDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
m_score = #{mScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
m_addtime = #{mAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_time = #{mTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_playfrom = #{mPlayfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_downfrom = #{mDownfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_content = #{mContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
m_playurl = #{mPlayurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
m_downurl = #{mDownurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update movie set m_name = #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_subname = #{mSubname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_pic = #{mPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_picthumb = #{mPicthumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_picslide = #{mPicslide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_starring = #{mStarring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_directed = #{mDirected,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_tag = #{mTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_area = #{mArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_lang = #{mLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_year = #{mYear,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, m_type = #{mType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, m_type_expand = #{mTypeExpand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_class = #{mClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_topic = #{mTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_hide = #{mHide,jdbcType=BIT}, m_lock = #{mLock,jdbcType=BIT}, m_state = #{mState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_level = #{mLevel,jdbcType=BIT}, m_hits = #{mHits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_dayhits = #{mDayhits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_weekhits = #{mWeekhits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_monthhits = #{mMonthhits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_duration = #{mDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, m_score = #{mScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, m_addtime = #{mAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_time = #{mTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_playfrom = #{mPlayfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_downfrom = #{mDownfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_content = #{mContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, m_playurl = #{mPlayurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, m_downurl = #{mDownurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
